dublin_core.dcvalue: Legal prerequisites have substantial influence on the development of teleradiology At an expert meeting Mannheim 8 6 2001 a proposal for a teleradiology article in the new German x ray ordinance has been set up An exception of the demand for a doctor trained in radiation protection at the point of examination shall be established for emergency cases To realize the intended improvement of patient care measurements for quality assurance concerning the medical personnel and processes are necessary Along with other current developments the basis of secure regional teleradiology networks is now built up
[The future of teleradiology: results of Teleradiology Expert Meeting of the Health Network Congress 2001].
